sections.heading: ticket; requirements.Each county, city, or village conducting a lottery shall have its name clearly associated with each ticket used in the lottery
sections.text: No such ticket shall be sold unless such name is clearly identified.SourceLaws 1986, LB 1027, ยง 182;R.S.1943, (1987), ยง 9-611;Laws 1989, LB 767, ยง 90;L
